description: This file defines a helper class for managing an SQLite database of baby names, including schema creation, data seeding, and database connection handling.

classes.name: DatabaseHelper
classes.description: Singleton class responsible for initializing, accessing, and managing the SQLite database with pre-seeded baby name data.

methods.name: database
methods.description: Provides a singleton instance of the database, initializing it if necessary.

methods.name: _initDatabase
methods.description: Initializes the database, setting up schema and seed data on creation.

methods.name: _onCreate
methods.description: Creates database tables and indexes, and seeds initial data.

methods.name: _seedData
methods.description: Inserts predefined baby name data into the database during setup.
